spots.name: Post Third Floor (IC SPACE)
spots.description: The third floor provides a study space available to all students who know how to sneak into the POST building past 7pm. Other than the fact that they barricaded the doors with state of the art locks, using the trick that I like to call, going AROUND the building, seems to do the trick. IC Space comes with a snack bar and tables outside if they're having their annual anime yikes meetings.

spots.name: Sinclair First Floor Study Space
spots.location: Sinclair Building (former library, 2425 Campus Rd, Honolulu, HI 96822
spots.description: The study space when you enter sinclair on the right provides tables for single use. The wifi is great and it is not cold.

spots.name: Library Second Floor Study Rooms
spots.description: Quiet, lots of resources, indoors, AC, private room, chalk board, you have to reserve

spots.name: Post First Floor
spots.description: You can only study in two study rooms. They are 126, and 127. For some reason they like to keep the lecture room open late, and security is chill about it. Good for meetings. 24/7

spots.name: Hamilton Library First Floor
spots.description: Quiet, lots of resources, indoors, warm

spots.name: Sinclair Second Floor
spots.location: Sinclair Building (former library, 2425 Campus Rd, Honolulu, HI 96822
spots.description: Quiet, lots of resources, indoors, warm

spots.name: Hamilton Library Second Floor
spots.description: Quiet, lots of resources, indoors, warm

spots.name: Sinclair Third Floor
spots.location: Sinclair Building (former library, 2425 Campus Rd, Honolulu, HI 96822
spots.description: Quiet, lots of resources, indoors, AC pumping, large tables for groups

spots.name: Library Third Floor
spots.description: Quiet, lots of resources, indoors, air conditioning

spots.name: Starbucks (not on campus)
spots.description: This starbucks is way better than the campus starbucks because the students walking all the way to this starbucks is trying to get some peace whilst studying. AC is good and tables are present.

spots.name: Ban'an
spots.description: Enough tables for group study sessions, AC, good ice cream, and a bus stop right outside. It's walking distance back to campus.

spots.name: Campus Center Second Floor Starbucks
spots.description: There's a lot of pretentious hipsters that think studying here is the greatest thing in the world. The only good thing is that there's a lot of tables, good wind, and obviously, coffee next door. If you're going there to attempt to focus, you're out of luck.

spots.name: Post Second Floor
spots.description: For some reason the UH administration ran out of money to afford AC on the second floor of post so elitist engineering majors assimilate around the large tables. It's okay if you blend in though. 24/7.

spots.name: Stan Sheriff Center
spots.description: Good lighting, good AC, kind of weird though but if you know the faculty and staff they're pretty chill. Go to a bench and study up.

spots.name: William S. Richardson School of Law
spots.description: They got good lighting but lacking tables. If you find one though it's smooth sailing if you get a long enough extension cord for an outlet.

spots.name: Pieology
spots.description: A lot of people walking in and out but if you like white noise whilst studying it is a good place to go for lunch or dinner and get your work done.

spots.name: Paradise Palms
spots.description: Loud, A lot of people talking, a lot of table space though

spots.name: Music Building
spots.description: Really great if you know around the place, if you have access the music room and storage rooms there's desks with little to no people coming in and out after hours.

spots.name: Manoa Dining Services
spots.description: It's a chill spot to study with your friends or if you have down time in between classes. Not great if you're trying to focus. AC is okay. Noise is loud

spots.name: Campus Center Stairwell
spots.description: Background noise, outdoors, sunny

spots.name: Campus Center Tree
spots.description: Background noise, outdoors, sunny, LOUD

spots.name: Shidler College of Business
spots.description: Background noise, outdoors, sunny, there's a snack bar but over priced, tables are dirty.

spots.name: Parking Structure
spots.description: Honestly, the structure isn't that bad. The wifi is good in certain places and it's great if you cramming for a midterm.

spots.name: John F. Kennedy Theatre
spots.description: Background noise, bus keeps driving by, no table space

spots.name: Campus Center Subway
spots.description: Background noise, smells, no table space

spots.name: Kuykendal Outside Tables
spots.description: It straight up sucks, tried it, never again. Actually bridge kid andy.

spots.name: Warrior Recreation Center
spots.description: For some reason there's half naked people trying to sweat on my laptop. They keep asking me if I could spot but the only thing I'm spotting is a top heavy built man with chicken legs.
